subject: asset(icons): replace text icons with avatar of man with glasses and beard
body:
Created a new SVG avatar icon depicting a man with glasses and a beard,
using the project's existing color palette (dark navy #0f172a background,
light blue #38bdf8 face, dark teal #0c4a6e for hair/beard). Converted
to PNG at all required PWA sizes (192x192, 512x512, 180x180 apple-touch)
and regenerated favicon.ico.

Tags: asset, icon, pwa, branding
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: cv-content
Semver: patch
